item.description:
We will hike Camels Hump via the Burrows or Monroe Trail OR we may spot cars to do the Bamforth Ridge Trail. I'm in favor of spotting cars to hike the Bamforth Ridge Trail, but a friend of mine is leading this hike so I will update as the time gets closer.

UPDATE:  Notice Darryl's comments below (thank you, Darryl).    We will hike Monroe trail up and back.  If you need directons please ask.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Camels Hump
